strings:
<tag_voice_0x01001948><se_low>Morrie: Ay!? You be amazed, ah?
This is what I wanted to show you, <nickname>!

<voice_0x0100194D><se_low>Morrie: Can you feel it?
The sights, the sounds, the smells...
<voice_0x0100194E><se_low>Morrie: ...of MORRIE'S MONSTROUS PIT!

<voice_0x01001950><se_high>Marrie: Mor-rie!
I thought that name was our little secret!
Don't go tellin' the whole world!

<voice_0x01001951><se_low>Morrie: Che? Ah! Scusi, my flower.
Yes. The sights, the sounds, the smells...
<voice_0x01001952><se_low>Morrie: ...of the MONSTER ARENA!
<voice_0x01001953><se_low>Morrie: The rules are simplissimo!
<voice_0x01001954><se_low>Morrie: This is a place of monster combattimento! Teams of the three monsters fight heads to heads.

<voice_0x01001955><se_low>Morrie: There are seven different ranks for your team
to try! And this is all you need to know!
Simple, no?

<tag_voice_0x01001956><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You are wanting your own team, ay?
<tag_voice_0x0100195B><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! I knew you would say yes!
DUMMY - e512_3, event_msg211 NOT USED
<voice_0x01001960><se_low>Morrie: But it is not so easy to have your own team! Capiche?

<voice_0x01001961><se_high>Marrie: Er...Morrie...
They said they didn't want a team.
<voice_0x01001962><se_low>Morrie: Cosa!? Ma sei imbecille?

<tag_voice_0x01001963><se_low>Morrie: I will ask you one more time!
<Cap><nickname>! You want your own team, AY?
<voice_0x01001968><se_low>Morrie: I see... I cannot make the force for you to do it.
<voice_0x01001969><se_low>Morrie: But you have the potential! If you awake one day to find your belly on fire with the PASSION to have your own team, come back to me! I will be waiting!

<voice_0x0100196A><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! Si. I knew you would say si!
Volere è potere! Where there's a willy,
there's a way, ay!
DUMMY - e512_3, event_msg281 NOT USED

<voice_0x0100196B><se_low>Morrie: But the rules say you will need the 200,000
gold pieces.
<tag_voice_0x0100196C><se_low>Morrie: Now you know why this place is full of the rich people, ay? So, <nickname>! Can you pay the money?

<voice_0x01001971><se_low>Morrie: Sorry. I do you wrong.
I should never have asked such a question.
Scusi.

<tag_voice_0x01001972><se_low>Morrie: Ah-ha! I like that about you, <nickname>!
But be careful what you're saying, ay!
<voice_0x01001977><se_low>Morrie: I explain what I mean...
<voice_0x01001978><se_low>Morrie: The 200,000 gold pieces you need for to have your own monster team...
<voice_0x01001979><se_low>Morrie: I will make the payment for you.

<tag_voice_0x0100197A><se_low>Morrie: But naturalmente, I not give it to you without
‘no wires attached’, ay! There are conditions!
You must swear this one thing...
<voice_0x0100197F><se_low>Morrie: You must swear to fight your way to the very top of the Monster Arena!

<voice_0x01001980><se_low>Morrie: What do you say? Can you swear it?
Do you have what it takes?
CAN YOU CONQUER MY MONSTROUS PIT!?

<tag_voice_0x01001981><se_low>Morrie: Then it is decided! <Cap><nickname>!
From this moment, you are the owner of your very own monster team!

<voice_0x01001987><se_high>Marrie: Er...Morrie...
They said they didn't swear.
<voice_0x01001988><se_low>Morrie: Che!? Well...what are ya gonna do, ay!?
<voice_0x01001989><se_low>Morrie: Just make sure you give it your best shooting, okay!?

<tag_voice_0x0100198A><se_low>Morrie: That is all I care! <Cap><nickname>!
From this moment, you are the owner of your very own monster team!

<tag_voice_0x01001981><se_low>Morrie: Then it is decided! <Cap><nickname>!
From this moment, you are the owner of your very own monster team!
<Cap><hero> becomes a monster team owner!
<voice_0x0100198F><se_low>Morrie: So, let's get straight down to business, ay!
<voice_0x01001990><se_low>Morrie: First you will need a good, strong name for your team. An intenso name that shows the<->the<->the PASSION!
<voice_0x01001991><se_low>Morrie: If you cannot think of a good name, I can do it for you. So, you wanna name your own team?
<tag_voice_0x010019A8><se_low>Morrie: Then let Morrie use his poetic genius to think of the perfect name for you!
<tag_voice_0x010019A3><se_low>Morrie: Va bene... Let me see...
<voice_0x0100199D><se_low>Morrie: Si! I am a genius!
<voice_0x010019AD><se_low>Morrie: The Whiplash Whippers! Well?

<voice_0x010019AE><se_low>Morrie: Che!? You don't like it!?
Really? Va bene. I will think of another name.
<voice_0x010019B1><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Belly Bruisers!?

<voice_0x010019B2><se_low>Morrie: Ay!? You don't like that one too?
Va bene.
<voice_0x010019B3><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Puffing Puddings!?
<voice_0x010019B4><se_low>Morrie: The Eager Beavers!?
<voice_0x010019B5><se_low>Morrie: The Amorous Avengers!?
<voice_0x010019B6><se_low>Morrie: The Tolerable Titans!?
<tag_voice_0x010019B7><se_low>Morrie: Ay!? Not an easy one to please, ay <nickname>!?
<voice_0x010019BC><se_low>Morrie: You must have a team name to register your team. I go again from the top!
<voice_0x010019BD><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Whiplash Whippers?
<voice_0x010019BE><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Belly Bruisers!?
<voice_0x010019BF><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Puffing Puddings!?
<voice_0x010019C0><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Eager Beavers!?
<voice_0x010019C1><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Amorous Avengers!?
<voice_0x010019C2><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Tolerable Titans!?
<tag_voice_0x010019C3><se_low>Morrie: Phew! Hey you've got to meet me half-way, <nickname>!?
<voice_0x010019C8><se_low>Morrie: You must have a team name to register your team. Otherwise we don't get nowhere, capiche!? I go again from the top!
<voice_0x01001994><se_low>Morrie: This name, it is okay?
<tag_voice_0x010019EE><se_low>Morrie: You don't like it? Then I try it again from the top for you, <nickname>!

<voice_0x01001993><se_low>Morrie: So, you want to choose your own name?
Let's see what you got, ay!?
It must be eighteen letters or less.

<voice_0x01001995><se_low>Morrie: That's your name!? Where is the forza,
the bravado, the PASSION, ay?
Ah, never mind! It will do!

<tag_voice_0x01001996><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your team!
<voice_0x010019F8><se_low>Morrie: Now you must think of the team members!
<tag_voice_0x010019F9><se_low>Morrie: At first, your team will consist of the three monsters you found for me: Lonely Joe, Squiggles and Smiles.
<voice_0x010019FE><se_low>Morrie: But of course! You will never reach the top of Morrie's monstrous pit with such a team!

<tag_voice_0x010019FF><se_low>Morrie: You need to find the stronger monsters during your travels to make your team better.
And remember this...
<voice_0x01001A04><se_low>Morrie: The strength of the monsters in the team is also affected by the strength of the team owner.
<voice_0x01001A05><se_low>Morrie: But that doesn't mean you will have the strong team just by being the strong owner!
<voice_0x01001A06><se_low>Morrie: And the monsters are not like the humans. No. They don't get no stronger by fighting more.
<voice_0x01001A07><se_low>Morrie: In some other words...

<voice_0x01001A08><se_low>Morrie: If you want your team to be better,
you must swap the team members for
the stronger monsters.
<voice_0x01001A09><se_low>Morrie: That's right! Your mission is to search the world for powerful monsters! Add them to your team and make it stronger!

<voice_0x01001A0A><se_low>Morrie: Build the ultimate team and rise to the very
top of my monstrous pit! That is the thrill!
The ecstasy of the Monster Arena!
<voice_0x01001A0C><se_low>Morrie: The ECSTASY of the Monster Arena!
<voice_0x01001A0D><se_high>Marrie: Er...Morrie... I think everyone heard you loud and clear the first time, darlin'!

<voice_0x01001A0E><se_low>Morrie: Che? Ah...scusi, scusi.
I just thought it needed more GUSTO!

<voice_0x01001A0F><se_low>Morrie: But anyway...
You will need this.
<voice_0x01001A10><se_low>Morrie: Now you can enter in the arena whenever you want, and take part in the championato of my monstrous pit any time you like!
<voice_0x01001A11><se_low>Morrie: Go and talk to the man at the centre counter whenever you want to enter the pit.
<voice_0x01001A12><se_low>Morrie: But if you want to be smart, you talk to some people and get the informazione first, ay?
<tag_voice_0x01001A13><se_low>Morrie: I look forward to seeing your GUSTO, <nickname>! Buona fortuna!

<tag_voice_0x0100199E><se_low>Morrie: No good, ay?
Then let me think of the name for you!

<tag_voice_0x01001A18><se_low>Morrie: Ah! So, <nickname>!
You have found your belly is on fire, ay?
You discover the PASSION!

<voice_0x01001A1D><se_low>Morrie: Si! It burns on your eyes!
You want your own monster team!
Am I right?
<Cap><leader> receives the Monster Arena key and puts it in the bag.

<voice_0x0100199B><se_low>Morrie: No good, ay?
Then let me think of the name for you!
<voice_0x0100199C><se_low>Morrie: Va bene... Let me see...
<voice_0x010019A8><se_low>Morrie: Then let Morrie use his poetic genius to think of the perfect name for you!
<voice_0x010019ED><se_low>Morrie: You don't like it? Then I try it again from the top for you!

<tag_voice_0x010019CF><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your team!

<tag_voice_0x010019D4><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your team!

<tag_voice_0x010019D9><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your team!

<tag_voice_0x010019DE><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your team!

<tag_voice_0x010019E3><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your team!

<tag_voice_0x010019E8><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your team!
<voice_0x010019C9><se_low>Morrie: The Whiplash Whippers it is then?
<voice_0x010019CA><se_low>Morrie: The Belly Bruisers it is then?
<voice_0x010019CB><se_low>Morrie: The Puffing Puddings it is then?
<voice_0x010019CC><se_low>Morrie: The Eager Beavers it is then?
<voice_0x010019CD><se_low>Morrie: The Amorous Avengers it is then?
<voice_0x010019CE><se_low>Morrie: The Tolerable Titans it is then?
